title: Revenue of Starwood Hotels & Resorts 2005 to 2015
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately negative which exists from 2015 to 2012.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2012 to 2009.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2009 to 2007.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2007 to 2005.
gold: This statistic shows the revenue of Starwood Hotels & Resorts worldwide from 2005 to 2015 . The hotel company generated approximately 5.76 billion U.S. dollars in revenue in 2015 . Starwood Hotels & Resorts was founded in 1969 and now has more than 1,200 properties worldwide .
